revised_title: Molecular Orbital Method for Bonds of Fractional Order in Aromatic Molecules
tldr: The authors propose a new method for calculating the order of a bond in aromatic molecules using molecular orbitals. This method is more efficient and accurate than previous methods, allowing for easier calculations of bond lengths and orders in complex molecules. The authors demonstrate the effectiveness of their method by applying it to benzene and cyclobutadiene, showing that it predicts bond lengths and orders in agreement with previous research.
